description: Source code for an AI service module that interacts with the Anthropic AI SDK to generate summaries, quizzes, feedback, chat responses, and YouTube search strings within an LMS platform.

classes.name: AIService
classes.description: Class providing methods to generate summaries, quizzes, feedback, chat responses, and YouTube search strings using the Anthropic SDK.

methods.name: normalizeQuiz
methods.description: Normalizes and validates a quiz schema with exactly 5 questions, each with 4 options and a correct answer index.

methods.name: normalizeLearnerQuiz
methods.description: Normalizes and validates a learner quiz with exactly 10 questions, each with 4 options and a correct answer index.

methods.name: generateSummary
methods.description: Creates a concise 3-paragraph summary of provided lesson content.

methods.name: generateQuiz
methods.description: Generates a 5-question multiple choice quiz based on lesson content, ensuring schema validity.

methods.name: generateLearnerQuiz
methods.description: Creates 10 MCQs for learner self-assessment based on topic and difficulty.

methods.name: generateQuizFeedback
methods.description: Provides feedback on learner performance, highlighting strengths and areas for improvement.

methods.name: generateAssignmentFeedback
methods.description: Generates instructor feedback on an intern's assignment submission.

methods.name: chat
methods.description: Role-specific chat interface for instructors, managers, admins, or learners, with context-aware prompts.

methods.name: generateYoutubeSearchKeyword
methods.description: Creates a concise YouTube search string based on course and lesson context.
